Author: hideyowife1
Text: -You'll be able to go to those outing with friends/not worry about isolating yourself in fear of situations that require eating.  -Being able to look in the mirror and just be, without hating yourself and worrying about if you should eat or not. Just live and being happy with yourself  -You won't spend years/months/hours on your life focusing on something mundane as food and punishing yourself for existing!! An Ed wastes so much time and takes so much effort that can into doing what you love!
